Tables

Some gibberish about tables.

Default


<table class="pure-table">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>#</th>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>Title</th>
      <th>Sector</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>1</td>
      <td>Barack Obama</td>
      <td>President</td>
      <td>Government</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>2</td>
      <td>Bernard Tyson</td>
      <td>President and CEO</td>
      <td>Provider</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>3</td>
      <td>Sylvia Mathews Burwell</td>
      <td>Secretary</td>
      <td>Government</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>

Example:

#NameTitleSector
1Barack ObamaPresidentGovernment
2Bernard TysonPresident and CEOProvider
3Sylvia Mathews BurwellSecretaryGovernment
